Dear {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
You can start taking advantage of all your plan benefits by visiting your Member Center here.
Instructions:
Log in as 'existing member' using your username and password Click on the link “Business Advantage Member Center” Click on "Request a Consultation" Complete all the empty fields Click on submit Click on Schedule Consultation Select time and date from attorneys schedule, or quick call back option (if available) On the Appointment Details page, click on Make Appointment (bottom right) You will receive an Attorney Consultation Appointment Confirmed email.
Business Advantage Pro is a membership that gives you access to the following benefits:
Attorney advice and consultations. Speak with an experienced attorney on an unlimited number of new legal matters Attorney drafted letters. Your attorney can draft legal letters on your behalf 25% savings on additional attorney services. Get significant savings on additional attorney work if you need it
As a Business Advantage member, you also receive the following benefits from LegalZoom:
Unlimited access to LegalZoom legal forms. Download hundreds of blank legal forms for business or personal use 10% savings on any LegalZoom legal documents. Get any LegalZoom business or personal documents at a discount
If you have any questions or need further information, please call our Customer Care Team at 877.818.8787 Mon-Fri 5am to 7pm PT; Saturday 7am to 4pm PT.
Best regards,
